overview: Isabel, a young researcher and employee of the Cinemateca, discovers that she is pregnant at the same time that she receives a bombastic news: the Cinemateca is going to close!  All employees and collaborators are dismissed.  Isabel is outraged and decides to react.  THE PREGNANT CINEMATECA is a cinematic fable about the abandonment of art and culture by the State.
